messages.content: I’m a professor at Oregon State University working in scientific visualization, high-performance computer graphics, geometric modeling, and computer-aided design.  I’m looking for relevant external research grants that align with my work. Please find and rank suitable opportunities.

last_tool_result.query_text: scientific visualization high-performance computer graphics geometric modeling computer-aided design

results.title: Building Sustainable Software Tools for Open Science (R03 Clinical Trial Not Allowed)
results.reason: Graphics optimization and performance scalability overlap; software engineering expertise limited.

results.title: Pilot Program to Increase Research Capacity at  Historically Black Colleges and Universities and Other Minority-Serving Institutions
results.agency: Dept of the Army -- Materiel Command
results.reason: Graphics expertise supports technology transfer; visualization research advances faculty capability.

results.title: Carderock BAA
results.reason: 3D modeling and CAD tools overlap minimally with naval hydrodynamics and marine engineering requirements.

results.title: BRAIN Initiative: Brain-Behavior Quantification and Synchronization – Transformative Research on Behavior at the Organismal Level
results.reason: Faculty expertise in visualization and graphics lacks neuroscience, signal processing, and behavioral recording capabilities.

results.title: ROSES25: B.2 Heliophysics Foundational Research
results.reason: Graphics expertise lacks heliophysics domain; minimal application requirement coverage.

results.title: National Centers for Cryo-electron Tomography (cryoET) (R24 -Clinical Trial Not Allowed)
results.reason: Faculty expertise in visualization and 3D reconstruction lacks cryo-electron tomography domain knowledge.

results.title: Cooperative Agreement for affiliated Partner with the Californian Cooperative Ecosystem Studies Unit
results.reason: Faculty expertise in computer graphics and visualization lacks coastal ecosystem and wetland ecology knowledge.

results.title: Physical Oceanography
results.reason: Faculty expertise in graphics and visualization lacks oceanographic domain knowledge.

results.title: ROSES25: B.6 Heliophysics Technology and Instrument Development for Science
results.reason: Faculty expertise in graphics and visualization lacks space instrumentation and plasma diagnostics capabilities.

results.title: National Resource Network for the Study of Human Auditory and Vestibular Disorders
results.reason: Faculty expertise in graphics and visualization lacks human tissue preparation and biomedical research capabilities.
